data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Indiana, United States not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Indiana, United States
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 1,777,428 believers in the state of Indiana into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Indiana, United States.
data.prayer: Lord, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Indiana who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 1,777,428 believers living in the state of Indiana. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Fulbe, Fulani people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Fulbe, Fulani people.
Lord, please give the 1,777,428 believers in the state of Indiana the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Indiana, United States.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Indiana.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Indiana
location.cities_list: Indianapolis, Fort Wayne, Evansville, South Bend, Carmel
